capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just thinking about Professor McGonagall the other day. She's definitely an adult, you know? I mean, she's been teaching Transfiguration at Hogwarts for years and has this whole no-nonsense attitude that's really inspiring. I've always admired her maturity and wisdom, especially considering how young she is compared to some of the other professors.

I think Professor McGonagall is an amazing role model, especially for young witches like myself. I mean, she's not just a great teacher, but also a talented Transfiguration expert and a fierce advocate for what's right. Her age may be considered adult, but to me, it only adds to her wisdom and experience.
